context.rdfs:comment: A media object, such as an image, video, or audio object embedded in a web page or a downloadable dataset i.e. DataDownload. Note that a creative work may have many media objects associated with it on the same web page. For example, a page about a single song (MusicRecording) may have a music video (VideoObject), and a high and low bandwidth audio stream (2 AudioObject's).
context.rdfs:label: MediaObject

properties.rdfs:comment: Date when this media object was uploaded to this site.
properties.rdfs:label: uploadDate

properties.rdfs:comment: Player type required—for example, Flash or Silverlight.
properties.rdfs:label: playerType

properties.rdfs:comment: The bitrate of the media object.
properties.rdfs:label: bitrate

properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates if use of the media require a subscription (either paid or free). Allowed values are true or false (note that an earlier version had 'yes', 'no').
properties.rdfs:label: requiresSubscription

properties.rdfs:comment: The regions where the media is allowed. If not specified, then it's assumed to be allowed everywhere. Specify the countries in ISO 3166 format.
properties.rdfs:label: regionsAllowed

properties.rdfs:comment: A URL pointing to a player for a specific video. In general, this is the information in the src element of an embed tag and should not be the same as the content of the loc tag.
properties.rdfs:label: embedUrl

properties.rdfs:comment: Actual bytes of the media object, for example the image file or video file.
properties.rdfs:label: contentUrl

properties.rdfs:comment: A NewsArticle associated with the Media Object.
properties.rdfs:label: associatedArticle

properties.rdfs:comment: The CreativeWork encoded by this media object.
properties.rdfs:label: encodesCreativeWork
